reviewText: yet another reason to love and miss a place I once called home
One of the few 'history lessons' I've enjoyed.
Interesting history about beer in Bklyn....very cool. Cheers!
Really interesting as far as the history of Brooklyn in the old days compared to the present.  Nicely incorporated the beer movement with the history of old Brooklyn.
Interesting history of beer in Brooklyn and the rest of the US.
Loved it. Interesting history, good interviews, and well done film.

I loved this film which traced the history of Brooklyn through the start,, triumphs and ending of the big  brewing business and onto the new micro breweries.  The interviews are so much fun, everyone will love the beauty queen's tale.
I attended a screening of this video.
